statements: UPDATE Influencers SET follower_count = 1500 WHERE influencer_id = 1;

UPDATE comments SET commenter_name = 'Anonymous' WHERE comment_id = 3;

UPDATE Posts SET likes = 200, comments = 50, shares = 30 WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND post_id = '987e6543-b21c-43d5-e678-321654987234';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers = followers + 100, avg_likes = 500 WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Posts SET likes = likes - 10, shares = shares + 5 WHERE influencer_id = 'abc123' AND post_date > '2022-01-01';
